segments.text: I'm just watching this scene unfold, it's quite something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on that plate, utterly absorbed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring over the sink's edge, creating a substantial puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed her foot is in it!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's in her own little world, completely oblivious to the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That poor floor is going to be ruined with all this water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those cabinet doors, they're getting soaked too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a rather alarming amount of liquid spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such a simple task, drying a dish, yet everything else is going wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet just keeps running and running.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone should really turn that off before the whole kitchen floods.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she even hears the sound of the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation makes me feel a bit uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a strange tableau, domesticity amidst disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her concentration is truly remarkable, even if misplaced.
segments.speaker: PAR
